snippet: The federal overseer of the mortgage financing giants Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac has increased their mission at a time when they were supposedly being phased out.
abstract: Federal Housing Finance Agency, overseer of Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac, announces shift in policies intended to maintain mortgage finance giants' role in housing market, spur more home lending and aid distressed homeowners; statement, which comes as mortgage institutions are supposedly being phased out, raises bigger and divisive questions about whether they should be used as instruments for government housing policy.
lead_paragraph: The federal overseer of the mortgage financing giants Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac has increased their mission at a time when they were supposedly being phased out.

headline.main: A Major Lift for Fannie and Freddie
headline.print_headline: A Major Lift for Fannie and Freddie

keywords.value: Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corp (Freddie Mac)
keywords.name: organizations
